document.docTitle: Cheliplana mauii Gobert & Diez & Monnens & Reygel & Van Steenkiste & Leander & Artois 2021, n. sp.
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Cheliplana de Beauchamp, 1927 (Rhabdocoela: Schizorhynchia), with the description of six new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Species of
Cheliplana
~ 0.75 mm long. Proboscis consisting of 20–26-μm-long hook supports and a pair of 28–36- μm-long hooks. Anterior edge of the pharynx bearing papillae. Unpaired testis. Cirrus 9 μm long and ‘cupshaped’, with a proximal diameter of 15 μm and a distal diameter of 7 μm. A weakly sclerotised penile papilla almost entirely surrounding the cirrus.
